title: Gather Requirements
description: Thoroughly collect and document all requirements for the DataVault project, ensuring the following aspects are addressed: security, data storage, sharing mechanisms, access control models (including roles like advertiser, consumer, administrator), compliance with relevant regulations such as GDPR, CCPA, and PCI-DSS, and cross-platform insights. The collected requirements should be organized, easily accessible, and designed to accommodate future updates. Requirements should cover both user stories and functional specifications. This task will inform the design, development, and testing phases of the project.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for DataVault, including components, data flow, integration points, and emphasize on edge cases, performance optimizations, scalability strategies, ensure modularity for maintainability. Provide detailed diagrams, explanations, and risk analyses to facilitate understanding. Align with best practices in modern system design, consider containerization solutions such as Docker or Kubernetes, and ensure the architecture can handle high traffic and data volumes. Discuss how the architecture aligns with microservices principles, provide potential risks and mitigation strategies, and focus on security considerations throughout. Upon completion, update the 'implementation_state' field accordingly.

title: Define Data Models
description: Design and document the data models for storing and representing advertiser data, including user accounts, permissions, data types, relationships between entities, and data security considerations. Ensure scalability, performance, and compliance with privacy regulations such as GDPR and CCPA. Incorporate feedback from all relevant team members, focusing on aspects like data normalization and indexing for efficient querying. Upon completion, update the documentation to include examples and best practices.

title: Implement Security Mechanisms
description: Develop and implement security mechanisms for data storage, access control, and sharing.

title: Build Data Storage and Management Components
description: Develop components for storing, managing, and querying advertiser data based on the defined data models.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Create the user interface for advertisers to interact with the DataVault, including data upload, sharing, and access control.

title: Implement Cross-Platform Integration
description: Develop mechanisms for integrating the DataVault with various advertising platforms for data sharing and insights.
dependencies: Build Data Storage and Management Components

title: Set Up Deployment and Monitoring
description: Configure deployment pipelines, monitoring, and logging for the DataVault application.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the DataVault, including user guides, technical documentation, and API references.

title: Test and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the DataVault.
dependencies: Build Data Storage and Management Components
